message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. I'll take 9000, you take 1000. What do you say?
I'll give you a slightly better deal, Bob. I'll take 7500, you take 2500. Don't let it slip away!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a fair share!
I'm still willing to compromise, Bob. I'll take 5500, you take 4500. Don't make me go lower!
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. Time to make a decision!
I'm getting a bit desperate, Bob. I'll take 4250, you take 5750. This is my last reasonable offer!
You're running out of time, Alice. Take it or leave it!
This is my last offer, Bob. I'll take 2500, you take 7500. Don't make me go any lower!
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. This is my final offer!
This is my final offer, Bob. I'll take 1250, you take 8750. I'm not going lower!
I'll take it all. You're out of options, Alice.
